title: Unwanted champion from Capsule
body:
I play nearly exclusively ARAM, so I pay attention to only buy champions that I am willing to play with.
My main class focus is tank/support style champions, but give me an ADC and I will be as useful as a toddler who rubbed paint in his eyes.

Capsules have so far given me a bunch of champion shards, which I turn into blue essence, no problem.
But now I received a permanently unlocked champion from an honour capsule, without an option to refuse. Twitch {{champion:29}} . 
(Disclaimer: I don't particularly dislike Twitch, I realise he's a good champion in the hands of someone who can use him)

Is there a way to remove a champion from my champion pool? I'm not asking for any kind of refund, just a way to remove it from my champions.
Yes, I am aware that I can re-roll, but I prefer to do that if the team comp is too monotonous (e.g. 5 assassins)

replies.body: Ah yeah, the frustration of getting champs you don't want in ARAM especially after rerolling.  >< Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can look into removing it for you.  Just a heads up, though, we likely wouldn't be able to offer a refund with the removal if we are able to assist.
